name: Desert Bus 10x10
description:
Requires windows 8 at least!

A interesting experiment, running on a custom made c++ engine, this project has 100 gif's all from a full Decade of Desert Bus for Hope, either for watching, or just backgrounds while doing a charity run of your own.

It has a little bit of load time at the start, but runs smoothly afterwards. No mouse control, the main controls are "WASD" or Arrow keys. Space/Enter for accept/pause, escape to back out. "M" mutes/unmutes the music.
